system.description:
You have come into possession of an artifact and you also have the magical training and experience to maximize your understanding of it. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Intelligence, or wielder spellcasting ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain proficiency with the Arcana and History skills or an expertise die if you are already proficient. You also gain the artifacts specialty for Arcana and the legends specialty for History. If you already have one or both of these specialties, you can choose a different specialty from the corresponding skill in its place. The specialties from this benefit do not count against your specialties known.
  • Half your wizard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of progression of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.krwn0da3yjm9lh57]{Relic Arts} feature of the wielder class.
  • Half your wizard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the progression of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.i6yg9jmich8u6jjx]{Bonded Artifact} feature of the wielder class.
  • Half your wizard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iq8cqiia40rs54os]{Spellsword} feature, and you can use Spellsword with wizard spells of 1st level or higher.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in wielder, 3 levels in wizard
